issue.title: [Java] remove FieldReader from ValueVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5484](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5484). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Every implementation of ValueVector has an instance of .FieldReader, which has an overhead of 28 bytes on the heap. This can be avoided by instantiating the object only when required.
